source:
%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(T1.Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(T1.Pers_No,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',T1.Pers_No)
        WHEN LENGTH(T1.Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(T1.Pers_No,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',T1.Pers_No)        
        ELSE T1.Pers_No
    END as Pers_No,
    First_name,
    Last_name,
    Employee_No,
    CoCd,
    Company_Code,
    PA,
    Personnel_Area,
    PSubarea,
    Personnel_Subarea,
    Org_Unit,
    Organizational_Unit,
    Organizational_key,
    Organizational_key1,
    WorkC,
    Work_Contract,
    CT,
    Contract_Type,
    PS_Group,
    Pay_Band_Description,
    FTE,
    Wk_hrs,
    Indicator_Part_Time_Employee,
    S,
    Employment_Status,
    Gender_Key,
    TRA_Start_Date,
    TRA_End_Date,
    TRA_Status,
    TRA_Grade,
    Prev_PersNo,
    ActR,
    Reason_for_Action,
    Position,
    Position1,
    Cost_Ctr,
    Cost_Centre,
    to_timestamp(Civil_Service_Start) AS Civil_Service_Start,
    to_timestamp(Date_to_Current_Job) AS Date_to_Current_Job,
    to_timestamp(Seniority_Date) AS Seniority_Date,
    to_timestamp(Date_to_Subst_Grade) AS Date_to_Subst_Grade,
    Pers_No_1,
    Name_of_Manager_OM,
    Manager_Position,
    Manager_Position_Text,
    Counter_Sign_Manager,
    Loc,
    Location,
    to_timestamp(Org_Start_Date) AS Org_Start_Date,
    to_timestamp(Fix_Term_End_Date) AS Fix_Term_End_Date,
    to_timestamp(Loan_Start_Date) AS Loan_Start_Date,
    to_timestamp(Loan_End_Date) AS Loan_End_Date,
    EEGrp,
    Employee_Group,
    Annual_salary,
    Curr,
    NI_number,
    Birth_date,
    Age_of_employee,
    EO,
    Ethnic_origin,
    NID,
    Rel,
    Religious_Denomination_Key,
    SxO,
    Wage_Type,
    Employee_Subgroup,
    LOA_Abs_Type,
    LOA_Absence_Type_Text,
    Scheme_reference,
    Pension_Scheme_Name,
    Disability_Code,
    Disability_Text,
    Disability_Code_Description,
    PArea,
    Payroll_Area,
    Assignment_Number,
    FTE_2,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to,
    report_monthend_date

FROM odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_historic T1
INNER JOIN (    SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_historic) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom
INNER JOIN (    SELECT Pers_No, MAX(report_monthend_date) AS Max_Rpt_Monthend_Date
                FROM odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_historic
                Group by Pers_No) Rpt_Date ON T1.Pers_No = Rpt_Date.Pers_No AND
                                        T1.report_monthend_date = Rpt_Date.Max_Rpt_Monthend_Date
